title: Run BLASTn — get_blast_results
text: asv Sequence BLASTed num_thread Number threads used db_path Path BLAST database perc_id Percent identity used perc_qcov_hsp Percent query coverage used

Retrieve FASTA names from BLAST DB based on subjectIDs — get_fasta_header
text: id SubjectID BLAST results db_path Path BLAST DB

title: Run Parallel BLAST — parallel_blast
code: parallel_blast(   asvs,   db_path,   out_file,   out_rds,   num_thread,   perc_id,   perc_qcov_hsp )

title: Run Parallel BLAST — parallel_blast
text: asvs Vector sequences BLASTed db_path Path BLAST database out_file Path output file out_rds Path output RDS file num_thread Number threads used perc_id Percent identity used perc_qcov_hsp Percent query coverage used

title: Run BLAST — run_blast
code: run_blast(asv, db_path, num_alignments = 3, num_thread, perc_id, perc_qcov_hsp)

title: Run BLAST — run_blast
text: asv Sequence BLASTed db_path Path BLAST database num_alignments Number alignments returned. Default: 3 best alignments. num_thread Number threads used perc_id Percent identity used perc_qcov_hsp Percent query coverage used
